page.title: 01Rural Landscape Near Huntley
page.content: The area is mostly gently rolling grass land with many deciduous trees.The drainage system runs in a southerly direction towards the River Severn.There are also many orchards. Most of the farms in the area are cattle farms,some producing milk and some beef. There are two churches in the area;one is Methodist and the other Anglican. The A40 is the only main road;it runs through Huntley to Ross and Gloucester. There are many friendly people around this area who are always willing to help you when needed. Though there are very few local amenities there are many in a ten kilometre radius of Huntley. The two main kinds of sport played in the area are football and cricket.
